name: Rise of Block
description:
Rise as far as you can in this simple game about a block.
Rise of Block is an endless arcade game. In this game as the block rises you must move left or right to avoid obstacles in your way. Each run the layout of obstacles with be randomly generated so you will not be able to predict where they will be. The run ends when you hit an obstacle. The game will also keep track of your high score, which is how many obstacles you have passed.
